Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photograph shows members of the KKK marching with a Trump-Pence presidential campaign sign when it is actually a digitally manipulated image.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photograph is not genuine and has been digitally manipulated.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photograph is authentic and portrays actual members of the KKK supporting the Trump-Pence campaign, which is not true.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it presents a manipulated image without providing any evidence or sources to back up its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the photograph was created as a hoax or to mislead people.
